metadata.creator: Scitron Digital Contents
metadata.description:
This CD was made available to members of Club Nintendo in Japan.


Composed by:

Kenji Yamamoto (1)
Koji Kondo (2,3,7,8,9,10,11,19,21,22,26)
Hajime Wakai (4,5)
Kazumi Totaka (6,13,15,17,23)
Kenta Nagata (12,14,24,25)
Shinobu Tanaka (16,20)
Toru Minegishi (18)


Tracks 23-26 are live performances by:

23: Kazumi Totaka (guitar, piano, bass)
24: Hajime Wakai (alto saxophone), Kazumi Totaka (vibraphone), Kenta Nagata (guitar)
25: Toru Minegishi (melodica), Shinobu Tanaka (piano), Kenta Nagata (bass), Totakeke (guitar)
26: Koji Kondo (cello), Asuka Ohta (piano)

Games
Metroid Prime: 01
Super Mario 64: 02, 03, 26
Pikmin: 04, 05
Yoshi's Story: 06
The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time: 07, 08, 10, 11
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask: 09*
The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker: 12, 21, 24
Wave Race 64: 13
Animal Crossing (Doubutsu no Mori): 14, 16, 18, 25
Doubutsu no Mori e+: 15, 17
Shin Onigashima: Zenpen: 19
Super Mario Sunshine: 20
Super Mario Bros. 3: 22
For the Frog the Bell Tolls: 23

*Despite being sourced as Majora's Mask, the track's origin is from Ocarina of Time.
metadata.subject: Original Soundtrack
Arrangement
metadata.title: Nintendo Sound Selection Vol. 1 - Peach <Healing Music>
